text: Nord-Ubangi (or Noord-Ubangi) is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Its capital is Gbadolite. Nord-Ubangi is in the northwestern part of the country on the Ubangi River. Before 2015, it was part of the Ã‰quateur province. It is divided into four territories: * Bosobolo * Businga * Mobayi-Mbongo * Yakoma ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Nord-Ubangi
